data.eml:eml: Three new species of the free-living marine nematode Metoncholaimus Filipjev 1918 (Enoplida, Oncholaimidae) from Argentinean coasts

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Russo, Virginia Lo, Pastor De Ward, Catalina T. (2019): Three new species of the free-living marine nematode Metoncholaimus Filipjev 1918 (Enoplida, Oncholaimidae) from Argentinean coasts. Zootaxa 4688 (1): 86-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4688.1.4
